newsitem.title: MEXICO: RESEARCH ALERT - ING Barings starts La Moderna.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - ING Barings starts La Moderna.

text.p: ING Barings said on Friday it had started Empresas La Moderna with a hold.
-- "Empresas La Moderna (ELM) is expected to show low stock price returns for 1997 and 1998, despite forecasts for strong growth in adjusted earnings," said Ana Maria Mendez, Mexico equity analyst.
-- "ELM is one the most expensive stocks in the Mexican market compared to the sector and has an ROE of 8.8 percent by ING Barings' earnings forecasts."
-- ING Barings forecasts ELM's year-end price target at $22.21 for 1997 and $25 for 1998, representing annualized appreciation of 13 percent in U.S. dollar terms.
